channel.title: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wonders of the Multiverse UA"

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for working on this! All the finished pages have been linked on the main page.

I'm going to be out of town all week next week so I went ahead and added links to all the unfinished pages as well (all feats I think). Once those pages are created the links should start working. Just double check the link you create it at with the link on the main page. If it's created correctly the link should change from gray to gold-ish (whatever color most of the links on the main page are).

item.title: Re: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
Pretty cool to see that we might be getting a planescape book :)

Thanks for helping start the work Valkyria

Agent of Order: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:agent-of-order-ua
Baleful Scion: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:baleful-scion-ua
Cartomancer: http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:cartomancer-ua

item.title: Wonders of the Multiverse UA
item.content:encoded:
New UA so new content to add! I'll be adding links here as the pages are completed.
https://media.wizards.com/2022/dnd/downloads/UA2022-WondersoftheMultiverse.pdf

Races:
Glitchling - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/glitchling-ua

Subclasses:
Fate Domain - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/cleric:fate-ua

Backgrounds:
Gate Warden - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:gate-warden-ua
Giant Foundling - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:giant-foundling-ua
Planar Philosopher - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:planar-philosopher-ua
Rune Carver - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:rune-carver-ua

Feats:
Agent of Order - Incomplete
Baleful Scion - Incomplete
Cartomancer - Incomplete
Cohort of Chaos - Incomplete
Ember of the Fire Giant (Revised) - Incomplete
Fury of the Frost Giant (Revised) - Incomplete
Guile of the Cloud Giant (Revised) - Incomplete
Keenness of the Stone Giant (Revised) - Incomplete
Outlands Envoy - Incomplete
Planar Wanderer - Incomplete
Righteous Heritor - Incomplete
Rune Carver Apprentice (Revised) - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:rune-carver-apprentice-revised-ua
Rune Carver Adept (Revised) - Incomplete
Scion of Elemental Air - Incomplete
Scion of Elemental Earth - Incomplete
Scion of Elemental Fire - Incomplete
Scion of Elemental Water - Incomplete
Scion of the Outer Planes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:scion-of-the-outer-planes-ua
Soul of the Storm Giant (Revised) - Incomplete
Strike of the Giants - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:strike-of-the-giants-ua
Vigor of the Hill Giant (Revised) - Incomplete

Spells:
Antagonize - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:antagonize-ua
House of Cards - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:house-of-cards-ua
Spirit of Death - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:spirit-of-death-ua
Spray of Cards - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:spray-of-cards-ua
Summon Warrior Spirit - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/spell:summon-warrior-spirit-ua
